issue.title: war files of 4.0.1 have uppercase on first letter
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

War files of 4.0.1 ( in https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/files) have first letter in uppercase.
If you download it and deploy it "as is" in tomcat, the context will be http://myserver:8080/Proxy instead of http://myserver:8080/proxy for example.
It's not a serious problem, the only effect is that all "default configs" in easySDI have lowercase URLs, so even if you have a "minimal" config (everything on the same host = default config in easySDI client) the URLs will have to be changed.

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.1
